short_bio: I'm a full-stack software engineer with 11+ years of relevant experience, an entrepreneur and a content creator. I've always been a firm believer in changing the world through the use of science and technology.

bio.full_bio:
I'm a full-stack software engineer with 11+ years of relevant experience, an entrepreneur and a content creator. I've always been a firm believer in changing the world through the use of science and technology. This is what has motivated my career choices.

In today's digital world, everything and anything is becoming automated. Technology is evolving every day and it continues to change the way we live. This is why it's important to me that I invest in my learning and development. I have done this by investing time into starting new and challenging projects with the latest technologies with the intention of brute-forcing my way into new fields in the technology space. This has paid off very well so far.

If you catch me outside, I'm talking about science, technology and airplanes.

experience.job_description: Lead a team software engineers in the development and implementation of Enterprise Resource Planning applications for SMEs. Work with project managers to allocate and assign projects and tasks to employees. Identify and form key partnerships to grow the company.Develop and deploy software tools for company-wide operations. Handle budgeting, optimize cost of production, analyze and optimize team performance. Create and build company culture and influence staff by it.

Developed and maintain the website of the hospital. Implementation, deployment and management of Hospital Management Systems for handling patients and resources of the facility. Liaise with medical professionals to design efficient patient intake and discharge procedures using digital Electronic Medical Record systems. Train and assist new staff on how to use the Electronic Medical Record systems.

Developed and maintained enterprise resource management software that helped the company in the recruitment of thousands of mobile money agents for banks. Set up and maintained Google cloud servers for handling company emails. Trained and assisted staff on how to use digital systems in the workplace.
